ing: 1/2 fresh pineapple, chopped into chunks and frozen
1 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
des: "This is a deliciously smooth and simple recipe that you and your kids will love. No added sugar... just fruit, juice, and delicious tropical goodness."
ins: Combine pineapple chunks, orange juice, and mango chunks in a blender; blend until smooth.
